DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety BMS-852927 28 day dose patient high cholesterol .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Study BMS-852927 Subjects With Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: Men woman , age ≥18 ≤75 Body mass index ( BMI ) ≤ 40 kg/m2 Primary hypercholesterolemia stable daily dose statin ≥ 6 week Serum triglyceride level screen < 400mg/dL ( < 4.52 mmol/L ) Any significant acute medical illness , significant cardiovascular history Current history hepatic hepatobiliary disease Evidence organ dysfunction clinically significant deviation normal physical examination , vital sign , ECG clinical laboratory determination beyond consistent target population
